languages.text: "Довольно, {petname}. Мелкое воровство не красит ни тебя, ни тво{mf|его|ю} хозя{mf|ина|йку}".
"{petname}, that's enough. Petty thievery presents neither you nor your owner in a favourable light."

languages.text: 「{petname}、もうやめろ。けちな盗みは、君も{mf|俺|私}も恥をかくだけだ」
languages.original_text: "{petname}, that's enough. Petty thievery presents neither you nor your owner in a favourable light."

traits.locale_text: 「{petname}、もうやめろ。けちな盗みは、君も{mf|俺|私}も恥をかくだけだ」

languages.text: "{petname}, das reicht. Diebstähle stellen weder dich noch {mf|deinen Besitzer|deine Besitzerin} in ein vorteilhaftes Licht."
languages.original_text: "{petname}, that's enough. Petty thievery presents neither you nor your owner in a favourable light."

traits.locale_text: "{petname}, das reicht. Diebstähle stellen weder dich noch {mf|deinen Besitzer|deine Besitzerin} in ein vorteilhaftes Licht."

languages.text: « Ça suffit, {petname}. Ce genre de larcin ternit ton image, et celle de {mf|ton maître|ta maîtresse} par la même occasion. »
languages.original_text: "{petname}, that's enough. Petty thievery presents neither you nor your owner in a favourable light."

traits.locale_text: « Ça suffit, {petname}. Ce genre de larcin ternit ton image, et celle de {mf|ton maître|ta maîtresse} par la même occasion. »

languages.text: «Ya basta, {petname}. Ir por ahí robando cosas ofrece una mala imagen de ti y de tu {mf|dueño|dueña}».
languages.original_text: "{petname}, that's enough. Petty thievery presents neither you nor your owner in a favourable light."

traits.locale_text: «Ya basta, {petname}. Ir por ahí robando cosas ofrece una mala imagen de ti y de tu {mf|dueño|dueña}».

languages.text: “到此为止，{petname}。这种小偷小摸的行为，对你和你的主人都是无益的。”
languages.original_text: "{petname}, that's enough. Petty thievery presents neither you nor your owner in a favourable light."

traits.locale_text: “到此为止，{petname}。这种小偷小摸的行为，对你和你的主人都是无益的。”

languages.text: "Bu kadar yeter {petname}. Hırsızlık ne seni ne de sahibini iyi gösterir."
languages.original_text: "{petname}, that's enough. Petty thievery presents neither you nor your owner in a favourable light."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kadar yeter {petname}. Hırsızlık ne seni ne de sahibini iyi gösterir."
